channel.title: flutter-web on SyncFire
channel.description: Recent content in flutter-web on SyncFire

item.title: Flutter Web - the URL problem fixed!
item.description: The Problem I love that there is an option to write code for the web without having to use CSS (the one thing I hate about web dev). Thanks to flutter, CSS is a thing of the past. With such convinence, you want to be able to build any sort of website using it. By default, flutter web has no capability for working will callbacks. This limits you from working with OAuth services or SSO systems.
